io.artframework

Interface RequirementContext<TTarget>

  • Type Parameters:
    TTarget - type of the target that is targeted by the Requirement
    All Superinterfaces:
    ArtObject, ArtObjectContext<Requirement<TTarget>>, Context, Requirement<TTarget>, ResultCreator, Scoped, TargetHolder
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultRequirementContext

    public interface RequirementContext<TTarget>
extends Requirement<TTarget>, ArtObjectContext<Requirement<TTarget>>
    The RequirementContext holds all of the information to execute the contained Requirement. It also provides a lot of useful additional features like storing data for the context of the requirement execution or accessing the Configuration.

      • test

        TargetResult<TTarget,RequirementContext<TTarget>> test(@NonNull
                                                       @NonNull Target<TTarget> target,
                                                       @NonNull
                                                       @NonNull ExecutionContext<RequirementContext<TTarget>> context)
        Description copied from interface: Requirement
        Tests if this requirement should filter Actions or Triggers for the given target. Return true for the check to pass and not to filter out the action. Return false if the check fails and the actions should be filtered.
        Specified by:
        test in interface Requirement<TTarget>
        Parameters:
        target - the target that is checked in this requirement
        context - the context that holds the config and context of the check
        Returns:
        false if the check fails and the filter should be applied or true if all checks pass and no filtering should be applied.
